005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CustomCollectors;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
013import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
014
015import java.util.Collection;
016import java.util.List;
017import java.util.Locale;
018import java.util.Map;
019import java.util.function.Function;
020import java.util.function.Predicate;
021import java.util.stream.Collectors;
022import java.util.stream.Stream;
023
024import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
025
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
027import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
028import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
029
030/**
031 * Provides a common, abstract implementation of a {@link IModule}.
032 *
033 * @param <M>
034 *          the imported module Java type
035 * @param <D>
036 *          the definition Java type
037 * @param <FL>
038 *          the flag definition Java type
039 * @param <FI>
040 *          the field definition Java type
041 * @param <A>
042 *          the assembly definition Java type
043 */
044@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
045public abstract class AbstractModule<
046    M extends IModuleExtended<M, D, FL, FI, A>,
047    D extends IModelDefinition,
048    FL extends IFlagDefinition,
049    FI extends IFieldDefinition,
050    A extends IAssemblyDefinition>
051    implements IModuleExtended<M, D, FL, FI, A> {
052  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(AbstractModule.class);
053
054  @NonNull
055  private final List<? extends M> importedModules;
056  @NonNull
057  private final Lazy<Exports> exports;
058
059  /**
060   * Construct a new Metaschema module object.
061   *
062   * @param importedModules
063   *          the collection of Metaschema module objects this Metaschema module
064   *          imports
065   */
066  public AbstractModule(@NonNull List<? extends M> importedModules) {
067    this.importedModules
068        = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(importedModules, "importedModules"));
069    this.exports = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> new Exports(importedModules)));
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "EI_EXPOSE_REP", justification = "interface doesn't allow modification")
074  public List<? extends M> getImportedModules() {
075    return importedModules;
076  }
077
078  @SuppressWarnings("null")
079  @NonNull
080  private Exports getExports() {
081    return exports.get();
082  }
083
084  private Map<String, ? extends M> getImportedModulesByShortName() {
085    return importedModules.stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(IModule::getShortName, Function.identity()));
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public M getImportedModuleByShortName(String name) {
090    return getImportedModulesByShortName().get(name);
091  }
092
093  @SuppressWarnings("null")
094  @Override
095  public Collection<FL> getExportedFlagDefinitions() {
096    return getExports().getExportedFlagDefinitionMap().values();
097  }
098
099  @Override
100  public FL getExportedFlagDefinitionByName(QName name) {
101    return getExports().getExportedFlagDefinitionMap().get(name);
102  }
103
104  @SuppressWarnings("null")
105  @Override
106  public Collection<FI> getExportedFieldDefinitions() {
107    return getExports().getExportedFieldDefinitionMap().values();
108  }
109
110  @Override
111  public FI getExportedFieldDefinitionByName(QName name) {
112    return getExports().getExportedFieldDefinitionMap().get(name);
113  }
114
115  @SuppressWarnings("null")
116  @Override
117  public Collection<A> getExportedAssemblyDefinitions() {
118    return getExports().getExportedAssemblyDefinitionMap().values();
119  }
120
121  @Override
122  public A getExportedAssemblyDefinitionByName(QName name) {
123    return getExports().getExportedAssemblyDefinitionMap().get(name);
124  }
125
126  @Override
127  public A getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitionByName(QName name) {
128    return getExports().getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitionMap().get(name);
129  }
130
131  @SuppressWarnings({ "unused", "PMD.UnusedPrivateMethod" }) // used by lambda
132  private static <DEF extends IDefinition> DEF handleShadowedDefinitions(
133      @NonNull QName key,
134      @NonNull DEF oldDef,
135      @NonNull DEF newDef) {
136    if (!oldDef.equals(newDef) && LOGGER.isWarnEnabled()) {
137      LOGGER.warn("The {} '{}' from metaschema '{}' is shadowing '{}' from metaschema '{}'",
138          newDef.getModelType().name().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT),
139          newDef.getName(),
140          newDef.getContainingModule().getShortName(),
141          oldDef.getName(),
142          oldDef.getContainingModule().getShortName());
143    }
144    return newDef;
145  }
146
147  private class Exports {
148    @NonNull
149    private final Map<QName, FL> exportedFlagDefinitions;
150    @NonNull
151    private final Map<QName, FI> exportedFieldDefinitions;
152    @NonNull
153    private final Map<QName, A> exportedAssemblyDefinitions;
154    @NonNull
155    private final Map<QName, A> exportedRootAssemblyDefinitions;
156
157    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConstructorCallsOverridableMethod")
158    public Exports(@NonNull List<? extends M> importedModules) {
159      // Populate the stream with the definitions from this module
160      Predicate<IDefinition> filter = IModuleExtended.allNonLocalDefinitions();
161      Stream<FL> flags = getFlagDefinitions().stream()
162          .filter(filter);
163      Stream<FI> fields = getFieldDefinitions().stream()
164          .filter(filter);
165      Stream<A> assemblies = getAssemblyDefinitions().stream()
166          .filter(filter);
167
168      // handle definitions from any included module
169      if (!importedModules.isEmpty()) {
170        Stream<FL> importedFlags = Stream.empty();
171        Stream<FI> importedFields = Stream.empty();
172        Stream<A> importedAssemblies = Stream.empty();
173
174        for (M module : importedModules) {
175          importedFlags = Stream.concat(importedFlags, module.getExportedFlagDefinitions().stream());
176          importedFields = Stream.concat(importedFields, module.getExportedFieldDefinitions().stream());
177          importedAssemblies
178              = Stream.concat(importedAssemblies, module.getExportedAssemblyDefinitions().stream());
179        }
180
181        flags = Stream.concat(importedFlags, flags);
182        fields = Stream.concat(importedFields, fields);
183        assemblies = Stream.concat(importedAssemblies, assemblies);
184      }
185
186      // Build the maps. Definitions from this module will take priority, with
187      // shadowing being reported when a definition from this module has the same name
188      // as an imported one
189      Map<QName, FL> exportedFlagDefinitions = flags.collect(
190          CustomCollectors.toMap(
191              IFlagDefinition::getDefinitionQName,
192              CustomCollectors.identity(),
193              AbstractModule::handleShadowedDefinitions));
194      Map<QName, FI> exportedFieldDefinitions = fields.collect(
195          CustomCollectors.toMap(
196              IFieldDefinition::getDefinitionQName,
197              CustomCollectors.identity(),
198              AbstractModule::handleShadowedDefinitions));
199      Map<QName, A> exportedAssemblyDefinitions = assemblies.collect(
200          CustomCollectors.toMap(
201              IAssemblyDefinition::getDefinitionQName,
202              CustomCollectors.identity(),
203              AbstractModule::handleShadowedDefinitions));
204
205      this.exportedFlagDefinitions = exportedFlagDefinitions.isEmpty()
206          ? CollectionUtil.emptyMap()
207          : CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(exportedFlagDefinitions);
208      this.exportedFieldDefinitions = exportedFieldDefinitions.isEmpty()
209          ? CollectionUtil.emptyMap()
210          : CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(exportedFieldDefinitions);
211      this.exportedAssemblyDefinitions = exportedAssemblyDefinitions.isEmpty()
212          ? CollectionUtil.emptyMap()
213          : CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(exportedAssemblyDefinitions);
214      this.exportedRootAssemblyDefinitions = exportedAssemblyDefinitions.isEmpty()
215          ? CollectionUtil.emptyMap()
216          : CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(ObjectUtils.notNull(exportedAssemblyDefinitions.values().stream()
217              .filter(IAssemblyDefinition::isRoot)
218              .collect(CustomCollectors.toMap(
219                  IAssemblyDefinition::getRootXmlQName,
220                  CustomCollectors.identity(),
221                  AbstractModule::handleShadowedDefinitions))));
222    }
223
224    @NonNull
225    public Map<QName, FL> getExportedFlagDefinitionMap() {
226      return this.exportedFlagDefinitions;
227    }
228
229    @NonNull
230    public Map<QName, FI> getExportedFieldDefinitionMap() {
231      return this.exportedFieldDefinitions;
232    }
233
234    @NonNull
235    public Map<QName, A> getExportedAssemblyDefinitionMap() {
236      return this.exportedAssemblyDefinitions;
237    }
238
239    @NonNull
240    public Map<QName, A> getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitionMap() {
241      return this.exportedRootAssemblyDefinitions;
242    }
243  }
244}
